meta.description: Optimize the number of small and large teams to maximize the amount of lawn that can be mowed.

sets.name: TEAM_TYPES
sets.description: Types of teams available for lawn mowing.

params.name: employees_required
params.description: Number of employees required for each team type.

params.name: lawn_mowed
params.description: Square feet of lawn mowed by each team type.

vars.name: num_teams
vars.description: Number of teams of each type to be used.

objective.name: max_lawn_mowed
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of lawn that can be mowed.

constraints.name: employee_limit
constraints.description: The total number of employees used by all teams cannot exceed the available employees.

constraints.name: small_teams_minimum
constraints.description: There must be at least 10 small teams.

constraints.name: large_teams_minimum
constraints.description: There must be at least 6 large teams.

constraints.name: small_large_team_ratio
constraints.description: The number of small teams must be at least 3 times the number of large teams.
